Title: Tuesday, November 15
Plot: Ten days after lawyer Anne Dragsholm was found dead at a WWII memorial, the police have her husband in custody for her murder. But the chief of investigation calls on Sarah Lund, who has transferred away from the crime squad, to return to Copenhagen to look over the case. Meanwhile, a young politician is made minister of justice after his predecessor is incapacitated, and a convict seeks parole from a detention facility to be with his wife and child
ParentalRatingReason: R13 Contains violence and content that may disturb
Director: Kristoffer Nyholm, Charlotte Sieling, Hans Fabian
Writer: SÃ¸ren Sveistrup, Michael W. Horsten, Torleif Hoppe
